outputs.output_descr: UNDP will support MCTI with technical and financial support as they redesign and revise Zambia's industrialization related policies and strategies to maximize possible impact on the high poverty levels as well as income inequality. Therefore, the goal of this project is to build capacity within Government to design improved policies that will reduce income inequality and assist in taking concrete action for a more equitable Zambia. The project goal will also promote innovation as a means of attaining sustainable and equitable growth and develop programmes that respond to the challenges facing the growth of SMEs, especially those that are youth and women-led or influenced. The specific project objective is to contribute to reduction of income inequality in Zambia through targeted Small and Medium Enterprise growth in selected urban and adjacent rural areas. The intended beneficiaries include the following:  (a) Policy Makers and Technocrats; (b) Academia; (c) CSOs; (d) Businesses  (identified Small and Medium Enterprises) and their Associations, specifically those in manufacturing and with potential to utilize opportunities to grow and create opportunities for themselves and for others (employment creation).

project_descr: Promoting innovative, inclusive and equitable growth in peri-urban areas of Zambia
